billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Establishes a moratorium on voluntary dissolution of limited-profit housing companies
summary: Establishes a moratorium on the voluntary dissolution of cooperative limited-profit (Mitchell-Lama) housing companies without the consent of the commissioner of housing or supervising agency until June 30, 2012.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to establishing a moratorium on voluntary dissolution of limited-profit housing companies
